answers.answer: I know exactly how u feel I am 32w2d and have been told I have gd it does suck big time and I to am sooo freaking frustrated all I want to do is cry and I have but I know that what I eat is not.good for my son so I try so very hard to eat what I'm supposed to but I do slip up from time to time just keep strong or almost.to the end of it and then.u can have all the ice cream u want
Once they told me I had gd I completely changed how I eat I haven't even cheated at all and my sugars are just not starting to come back high its so frustrating

question: I had my last appointment on Tuesday the dr told me that I have taken such good care of my blood sugars that I've eliminated all the risks of gestational diabetes except for having a large baby. Well ever since then my sugars have come back high and im eating normal stuff that I have been since being on this diet its all within my carbohydrate allowance for each meal its always normal when I get up in the morning Idk what's going on I have worked so hard to watch every single thing that I eat its so frustrating Idk what else to do I've only got 4 1/2 weeks left but im close to tears do you know how hard it is craving things and not being able to have them??? All I want is an oreo cookie blizzard from dairy queen this ***** big time
title: not a question im just depressed
